Record.definition: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."CMN_NSQL_QUERIES_INS_SP" ( p_nsql_text IN VARCHAR2, p_nsql_mode IN cmn_nsql_queries.nsql_mode%TYPE DEFAULT 'general', p_db_vendor IN cmn_nsql_queries.db_vendor%TYPE DEFAULT 'all', p_created_by IN NUMBER DEFAULT 1, p_nsql_id OUT NUMBER ) IS v_id NUMBER; BEGIN cmn_id_sp (p_table_name => 'CMN_NSQL_QUERIES', p_next_id => v_id); INSERT INTO cmn_nsql_queries ( id, db_vendor, nsql_mode, nsql_text, created_date, created_by, last_updated_date, last_updated_by ) VALUES ( v_id, p_db_vendor, p_nsql_mode, p_nsql_text, SYSDATE, p_created_by, SYSDATE, p_created_by ); p_nsql_id := v_id; END;
